sentence.Network_en: Resections in children do not produce a permanent physiologic handicap.

sentence.Network_en: Abnormally low or high body temperatute effect a variety of physiologic responses including lowered metabolic rate.

sentence.Network_en: The degree of immunity depends on the physiologic condition of the human subject.
